bullets: Developed a Python script to de-duplicate save tracking data, reducing daily manual effort by over 60% and increasing reporting accuracy
Generated interactive dashboards and KPI reports to monitor QA metrics, improving visibility and accelerating stakeholder decision-making
Leveraged AWS cloud infrastructure and SQL-based queries to process high-volume data efficiently, reducing analysis time and improving reporting scalability
Delivered actionable data stories to senior stakeholders, leveraging advanced analytics to highlight trends, improve SLAs, and drive process optimization
Provided technical support to students, faculty, and staff across Windows and macOS, resolving issues via phone, email, and remote sessions
Troubleshot walk-in issues including network connectivity, printing failures, and account access problems
Re-imaged systems and configured software to restore functionality and meet IT compliance standards
Maintained and prepared lab and classroom workstations to ensure reliable daily operation for students and faculty
